about_the_game: As both a car and motorcycle racer, Mike is known as one of the greatest of all time in his native United Kingdom. His greatest achievements were on his motorcycle with 9 World Championships and 14 TT wins. In 1978, "Mike the Bike" returned to the Isle of Man TT, 11 years after last competing in it. He went on to win it with this Ducati 900! With your controller, relive one of the greatest moments in the history of the Isle of Man TT. This iconic bike from the 1970s gives you a unique and challenging gameplay experience.
detailed_description: As both a car and motorcycle racer, Mike is known as one of the greatest of all time in his native United Kingdom. His greatest achievements were on his motorcycle with 9 World Championships and 14 TT wins. In 1978, "Mike the Bike" returned to the Isle of Man TT, 11 years after last competing in it. He went on to win it with this Ducati 900! With your controller, relive one of the greatest moments in the history of the Isle of Man TT. This iconic bike from the 1970s gives you a unique and challenging gameplay experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 i5-2300 or AMD Phenom II X6 1100T
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 630 2GB, or AMD Radeon HD 5870 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780, 3 GB or AMD Radeon R9 290X, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Relive one of the greatest moments of the Isle of Man TT with Mike Hailwood and his famous Ducati 900. With 14 TT wins, Mike Hailwood is a legend of the race and still among the elite in total number of victories.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
